mapper.insert: insert into member (m_email, m_name, m_gender, m_profile) values (#{mEmail}, #{mName}, #{mGender}, #{mProfile})
mapper.select: -- 스탠다드 회원 보유 코인 조회 -- select subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_POINT from SUBSCRIPTION subscribe where subscribe.M_ID = #{memberId} and subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_TYPE = 0
-- 주문내역 개수 -- SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST SUB_LF JOIN SUBSCRIPTION SUB on SUB_LF.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = SUB.SUBSCRIPTION_ID WHERE SUB.M_ID = #{memberId}

-- 주문 배송 현황(배송준비중, 배송중, 배송완료) 개수 -- SELECT D.DELIVERY_STATUS, COUNT(*) AS STATUS_COUNT FROM DELIVERY D JOIN LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST SUB_LF on D.SUB_LF_ID = SUB_LF.SUB_LF_ID JOIN SUBSCRIPTION S on SUB_LF.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = S.SUBSCRIPTION_ID WHERE S.M_ID = #{memberId} GROUP BY D.DELIVERY_STATUS
-- 스탠다드 구독 id 조회 select sub.SUBSCRIPTION_ID from SUBSCRIPTION sub where sub.M_ID = #{memberId} and sub.SUBSCRIBE_TYPE = 0
-- 프리미엄 구독 id 조회 select sub.SUBSCRIPTION_ID from SUBSCRIPTION sub where sub.M_ID = #{memberId} and sub.SUBSCRIBE_TYPE = 1
